item.title: Proxmox Notes
item.description: Networking> Networking # NAT config> NAT config # For my setup, I have one physical Ethernet connection on eno1 device, which by default is assigned to vmbr0. I configured a NAT bridge vmbr1 by following the instructions from the Proxmox Network config Guide.
